author: Conor Pope
title: Face masks a potential hazard in spreading Covid-19, virologist warns
description: Masks not worn correctly could increase risk of virus transmission, TCD expert says
content:
As the number of people wearing protective face masks in Ireland soars one of the States leading virologists has warned that the equipment may actually be doing more harm than good .
